EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Client}}, hear the newest research on independent contractors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us on September 26 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Future of Work: Self-Employed Workers Are Americaâ€™s Hidden Growth Engine <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>."
In this hour-long webinar, MBO Partners' CEO Gene Zaino will discuss the latest research on the self-employed workforce with Steve King and Carolyn Ockels, Partners at Emergent Research. Learn who the independents are, what motivates them, and how they find work in today's changing economy. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ Jay Lash VP, Market Strategies MBO Partners t: 703-793-6005 e: jlash@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
